attributes.action: Kids should be aloud to wear their own clothes at school!
attributes.additional_details: Also people can feel more comfortable in their own clothes because they can express themselfs with wearing whatever they would like its unfair how teachers can wear non uniform but students cannot leave a signiture for non school uniform.
attributes.background: Kids should be aloud no uniform since the school uniform is far to expensive and people cannot afford some school uniform. Also if you loose school uniform u have to replace it however with your own clothes you dont have to replace it .Leave a signiture if you believe kids can wear what they want.
